transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Yeah, good morning sir. Vinay just called bola tha IndiaMART se.
Customer: Are Vinay ji actually aapne wo customer care pe call kar rahe the sir to are main phone aapko laga raha tha to wo aapka number us pe chala gaya mujhe laga direct usi pe chala gaya. Chaliye bataiye sir.
Customer: Are batana tha kya wo mera GST naya wala update karna tha.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: To karwa dete.
Executive: GST mein kya change karwaya aapne?
Customer: Naam waam badal gaya na.
Executive: Achcha to GST number same hi hai na?
Customer: Nahi ji same kaise hoga badal gaya hai na.
Executive: Aap mujhe ek baar GST bhej dijiye theek hai and abhi jo naya wala GST hoga bhejiye main call pe hu maine aapko message dala hai good morning ka.
Customer: GST aapko whatsapp kar dunga na?
Executive: Haan GST bhejiye.
Customer: Document
Customer: Maine bhej diya aapko.
Executive: Gaya.
Executive: Abhi jo current GST wo band ho gaya?
Customer: Haan band hone wala hai.
Executive: Are ye band hua hai ki nahi band hua hai sir?
Customer: Abhi band nahi hua hai band hone wala hai ab use is mahine ke baad aage continue nahi karenge na.
Executive: GST
Executive: Sir bol rahe hain ki ek second dikha raha hu aapko.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ek second sir check hi kar raha hu.
Executive: Ekta Pandey ke naam se aur ye ye relation kya hai dono mein sir Arush Pandey aur Ekta Pandey mein?
Customer: Chacha bhatiji chachi bhati hai.
Executive: Chandra
Customer: Are pehle ye Manju Pandey naam se tha.
Executive: Uske baad kya matlab owner name bhi alag hai.
Customer: Are pehle ye Lakshmi Subhichit Corporation ke naam se tha.
Executive: Ye change ut kar ke
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan ji haan ji.
Customer: Pehle ye Lakshmi Subhichit Corporation ke naam se tha owner Manju Pandey thi.
Customer: Fir use jab dobara humne ye renew karwaya tha usse pehle change karwaya tha.
Customer: To fir ye Ekta ke naam se transfer karwaya tha abhi Ekta ke naam se abhi band hona hai to abhi ye Arush ke naam se transfer hona kyuki beta bada ho gaya na to abhi dusre ke naam se kar rahe the ab apne wapas.
Executive: To Arush aur Ekta mein maa bete ka relation hai?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ekta aur Arush mein chachi chachi chachi.
Customer: Arush Ekta chacha.
Executive: Samajh gaya aapki baat Ekta Pandey inki chachi hai Arush ki.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Nahi sir ye to relation fir wo sister concern nahi ban payega na mummy papa ka hota hai. Pichli baar kaise ho gaya tha dewrani aur jethani ka?
Executive: Pichli pichli baar GST cancel hoga unka?
Customer: Haan to wo bhi cancellation mein hi dalna hai.
Executive: Ye kab ki baat kar rahe ho aap?
Executive: Pichli baar kab?
Customer: Lockdown se pehle lockdown ke baad.
Executive: Sir lockdown ke baad ya lockdown se pehle?
Customer: Lockdown ke baad.
Executive: Ek second form client is suspended is not active.
Executive: Certificate khulaunga ek minute ruko.
Executive: Ek minute.
Executive: Isse pehle wala GST bata rahe wo kiske naam pe tha?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Isse pehle wala GST bata rahe ho kaun si company ka naam kya tha aur kiske naam pe tha wo? Lakshmi Subhi ches Corporation tha Arushi jo abhi naya GST bheja hai inki mother ke naam pe tha.
Executive: Haan to aur abhi transfer kiske naam pe hua tha pehle?
Customer: Fir wo dewrani ke naam pe hua abhi wapas unke bete ke naam pe hona hai.
Executive: Matlab ye keh rahe ho pehle ki jo Ayush hai inki mataji ke naam pe pehle tha Lakshmi.
Customer: Manju Pandey ke naam se tha.
Executive: Manju ke naam mein Manju Pandey naam se Manju Pandey se transfer hua tha fir ye Ekta Pandey jo inki chachi lagti hai.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Kyuki us samay minor tha isliye mujhe unke naam transfer karna pada.
Executive: Wo GST pada hua hai purana wala aapke paas?
Customer: Haan lekin wo ab suspended to ho gaya na matlab band kara diya tha.
Executive: Uske baad koi baat nahi GST number to aapko mil gaya. Ye ye wala ye wala jo GST hai Chandravansh Sales Corporation abhi current jo Ekta ji ke naam pe ye band ho gaya hai?
Customer: Nahi ab pehle lunga tab band karaunga na pehle band kara dunga fir lunga tabhi liya nahi hai fir mera kaam nahi chalega.
Customer: Nahi Arush Pandey wala le liya na ab to le liya haan to ye abhi hamare yaha pe live dikha raha hai. Ko cancellation mein dena hai.
Executive: Hmm theek hai thoda time do sir ek baar cross check karwana padega GST department se kyuki rules bhi badalte rehte hain na ye kal paanch saal pehle ki baat hai. Ek baar main check bhi kara deta hu kyuki jo aap document bol rahe ho ki same spelling match nahi kar raha hai.
Executive: Aur aapko GST mil jaye to GST GST mil jaye to GST bhej dena ek baar purana wala agar mil jaye to. Cancel hai koi baat nahi.
Customer: Purana wala GST number chahiye aapko?
Executive: Nahi nahi GST teen page wala GST jo aap bata rahe ho na change karaya tha aapne pehle jispe jispe karaya tha. Jis GST se jis GST mein change karaya tha agar wo mil jaye aapko wo bhej do. Ek baar cross check karwa deta hu department mein.
Customer: Are wo to main login karke abhi aapko de deta hu.
Executive: Haan bhej dijiye haan bhej dijiye whatsapp pe bhej dijiye GST number to isse login hota to hai hi hai abhi dikhta hai.
Executive: Haan Vinay ke whatsapp pe bhej dijiye aap. Koi baat nahi. Theek hai.
Customer: Hello
Customer: Hello
Customer: Hello
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to update new GST details.

- Wants to transfer GST to son's name.



Resolution:

- Executive asked for the GST documents.

- Executive will cross-check with the GST department.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send the GST documents on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- gst, update, transfer, documents, verification
